Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory265.png'}
{3: 'No. 21 sees her face reflecting on the clean glass. Her image is projected onto an area of flat buildings.'}
{3: 'The colors here are bright; the sunlight is supple. Everything seems to be composed of neatly cut white squares.'}
{3: 'A few hours prior, she and Vera were put into a Sleeping Pod. After a steady journey, they finally ended up here.'}
{3: 'Vera is quietly standing beside her. She looks around curiously as she observes her surroundings.'}
{3: 'The door in front of them opens and a woman walks out from within.'}
{3: 'The woman has a somewhat stern expression and wears professional attire. After looking at them, the woman smiles.'}
{2: '??', 3: 'You made it. Come in.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Vera remains motionless. The woman walks around them and proceeds directly to the other side of the corridor. No. 21 smells a faint fragrance on her.'}
{3: 'As she walks by, sunlight projects into the room through the gap in the door. The scene within the room begins to unfold in front of No. 21.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory46.jpg'}

{3: 'In the dim room, two men are sitting in the shadows. One of them is sitting at the table. Underneath his meticulous white hairline, his eyes hold a sharp gaze, like that of a hawk or falcon used for hunting.'}
{3: 'The other has his back turned to No. 21. His rough and messy red hair on the back of his head looks like fur.'}
{3: "No. 21 looks away at Vera, whose eyebrows are tightly furrowed. She cannot decipher Vera's expression. After scanning the room, Vera's gaze shifts to the older man sitting behind the desk."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: "Were you the one who brought us here, ol' man?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: "That's Nikola, Commander of the Babylonia Parliament.", 4: '2'}
{3: "The man slowly corrects Vera's address."}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: "Constructs Vera and No. 21, you have been officially transferred to Babylonia's Task Force under my direct supervision.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'No. 21 understands every word the man says, but when put together like that, she has difficulty understanding him. She repeats the only word she could pick out—Babylonia.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nikola', 3: 'Since you are—', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "Cut the official crap, I've heard it all before. Tell me something I haven't.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Vera cuts him off, crosses her arms, then fixes her glare on the other man.'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: "I'd recommend you keep your arrogance in check now that you're here. Hmph... Anyway. You'll be filled in later.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "There's a ton of other Constructs in Kurono. Why my team?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: 'Hah... Team. Can two Constructs without a commandant really be called a team?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: '"Why" doesn\'t matter. Soon, you\'ll officially have... something more worthy of being called a "team."', 4: '2'}
{3: 'The older man knocks on the table. As if he has received a signal, the man with his back to them turns his head. Sunlight only falls on half of his face.'}
{3: 'Half of his body is hidden in the shadows and half is exposed to the sun. He leans back in his chair and turns to look at Vera.'}
{2: '???', 3: 'Hmph. Am I really going to be stuck with you two?'}
{3: 'The red-haired man smiles, showing his fangs like a vicious dog.'}
{1: '1', 2: '???', 3: "What'd you two do to land yourselves here?", 4: '1'}
